email_content:
Hello Oakwood Owlets families,

I hope you’re all doing well. I’m reaching out to start organizing our children’s group science-fair project and to make sure everyone feels included and informed.

Key items
• Topic brainstorm – Please chat with your child and have them bring at least one idea to our next discussion.
• Materials – Once we choose a final direction, we’ll divide up supply gathering so that no single family has to purchase everything.
• Scheduling – I will propose a brief virtual check-in early next month, followed by an in-person work session the following week. Let me know whether weeknights or weekends work better for you.
• Parent helpers – If you’re willing to supervise a small group during any build or testing sessions, please let me know.

Feel free to reply-all with your thoughts or questions. Thank you for your support and enthusiasm—together we’ll make this a fun and rewarding learning experience for the kids.

Warm regards,
[Your Name]
Oakwood Owlets Project Coordinator
